Reference

All functions

data_springer_books_available()

Extract Data from Springer Database for Available Ebooks.

lib_extract_isbn_crossref()

Extract ISBN from the result of lib_metadata_crossref.

lib_isbn2googlebooksid()

ISBN to Google Books ID

lib_isbn2lccn()

ISBN to Library of Congress Control Number (LCCN).

lib_metadata_calibre()

Extract Calibre Metadata

lib_metadata_crossref()

Extract Crossref Metadata

lib_metadata_lc()

Extract Library of Congress Metadata.

lib_metadata_openlib()

Extract Open Library Metadata

lib_remove_doi_http()

Remove DOI HTTP.

lib_remove_doi_prefix()

Remove DOI Prefix.

lib_remove_isbn_dashes()

Remove ISBN Dashes.

lib_springer_calibredb_add()

Add Springer Books to Calibre

lib_springer_download()

Download Resources from link.springer.com.

lib_springer_files()

Create a list of available Springer books.

lib_springer_link()

Generate Spinger Links from DOI.

lib_wiley_doi2isbn()

DOI to ISBN for Wiley Books

springer_books_doi

Springer Books DOI
